[i]Circadian Beat[/i] – If it's neither day nor night, it becomes day as Constance, Fallen Noble enters.
[i]Sun Sulking[/i] – As long as it is day, Constance has ward {4}.
[i]Moon Mastery[/i] – As long as it is night, whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile target creature you control. You may cast that card without paying its mana costs.
